http://arch-angel24.livejournal.com/12058.html

yeah today really fucking sucked... we have figured out that she always needs someone to be pissed at & i think i figured out how she picks the person... it's the first fucking person she sees or talks to... and today I was that person... she asked why Sherri was here already & i said because she needed to come in an hour early & leave an hour early, & she just walked away from me & didn't even let me explain why... she thought we wouldn't have enough register people for the last hour we were open today because we're having inventory today & closing @ 6pm... so i asked Sherri if she would explain why she needed to come in early & she said ok well then Karen (that's my bosses name; isn't it lovely) comes over to me while i'm doing my job & asks if i said anything to Sherri & i was like yeah because you were pissed & didn't let me explain why... then she's like well that just caused me more problems... i was fucking pissed... if she really wants i can cause her a lot more fucking problems than she can handle... basically the rest of the day she was just being a bitch & snotty, but when she was walking around with her boss, Andy, she was all nice & laughing... i swear if i heard her laugh one more time i was going to rip out her throat... i don't think i've ever been this aggressive towards her... if she got on my case about anything else i was going to walk... i think she figured me out, she'll push me to the edge but not over, so i'm just really pissed off at her but she won't follow through so i can fucking scream in her face & quit... i am really growing to hate her... i only really hate 2 people in this world but there's room to add a third to the list... 

well i feel a little better now that i've vented but i'm still pissed... maybe i'll cast a hex on her or something... but knowing my luck it'll all come back on me & i'll be stuck there forever being her slave... i'd sooner kill myself... 

~karen~ or ~kb~
http://arch-angel24.livejournal.com/11957.html

i really just wish that people would get over stuff & move on... and stop trying to play guilt trips on me that make me feel bad about doing what really makes me HAPPY!!! damn it i've been through hell & been depressed & i think i deserve to be HAPPY!!!! JUST LET ME BE HAPPY FOR ONCE IN MY LIFE!!!!
http://arch-angel24.livejournal.com/11658.html

Scar Tissue

The heart breaks
allowing emotion,
in the form of tears,
to come flowing from
a seemingly strong man.
Even those
possessing the greatest
inner strength can
faulter and break down.
Many events of
great tragedy and sorrow
come to pass
during our short lifetimes.
Losing one you love
cuts deep, eventually
it will heal but
the scar tissue will
forever remain.
(9-19-06 Karen Braim)

Pap is gone... Dec 5th he passed... my birthday was 2 days ago & his is coming up in about a week... the day before he died dad, my sister & i & some other relatives were over visiting pap... he was sleeping & everyone knew the time would be soon... he got this surge of energy & wanted to sit up, so my gram & uncle sat him up & everyone was like this is a good sign, but in my sister & i's hearts we knew it wasn't... dad went over & put a hand on his knee & was talking to pap a little & then dad lost it & ran out to the garage... in all my 22 years i've never seen my dad cry until that day... which just started a chain reaction because my sis & i looked at each other & ran out after him bawling... we hugged him & must have cried together for what seemed like 5 minutes... i don't ever want to see my dad cry again... just picturing it in my mind brings back all those feelings & i just want to start bawling all over again... the next day i was at work & my sister called me, while i was working the main register no less, & i just started crying & shaking... i knew that the time would come but i wasn't ready for it to be that day... i called up Adam & he got me another cashier & i ran to the back & locked myself in the office & cried... after about 10 minutes i went back up front to ask if i could leave & Karen said just to go & not worry about anything... i left... i stopped quick at Jason's work to let him know that it had happened & that i'd be staying at grams with my sis that night... when i finally got to gram's, pap's body was still there... crystal said that gram just wouldn't let go of him... she'd been like that for over an hour... cry wasn't there when it happened but dad was & he called her & she flew back there... there was a lot more crying & between my sister & i we really didn't let gram out of our sight... that was the longest day of my life, and the shortest of paps... i know that it's all for the best because he was suffering a lot... he had stomach cancer & they thought through chemo they got it all but it came back a lot worse... pap was tired of treatment & tired of being sick all the time from it, so he just gave up getting better & just lived out his days... when i knew that pap was getting really bad i made a decision... pap has played in a lot of bands & i never got to hear him play, well over last summer he was up & playing again (i didn't know this at the time)... well my sis said that we were gonna go somewhere & Jason wouldn't come along it was just the girls... knowing my sis i'm thinking we're going to the sex shop or a strip club but she take me to the VFW & pap is playing... i was soooooooo excited that i was finally gonna get to hear pap play... well they were playing & gary was singing & then my sister says look who's singing & i looked over & it was pap... i almost started crying... i was sooo happy... so once pap got really sick i decided that i had to have a tattoo of his guitar on my back with "Pap" underneath it... now i just need to figure out who i trust to do this... this will be my first major tattoo... my little blue flame was nothing... so that is how i'm going to remember my pap...
~late~
http://arch-angel24.livejournal.com/11473.html

well last night at work, honestly i didn't do jack-shit. i wasn't feeling very well due to my emotional state so i kinda plugged through the first part of the day & then after Adam left & i finished getting the defectives on the truck to go back to the warehouse i decided to put a small patio table together & then an adirondack chair. well i haven't finished the chair yet. all i have to do is bolt the back to the arms & a brace to the front & then it's done. but Linda & i got to talking at like 8:15 after i did a refund & i stayed up there until 8:50 & then locked the doors early. no one was in there & i just didn't feel like having anyone else either.

around 4:45 (i think) Missy called me & said that they were taking her dad to the hospital because he was having chest pains & he's all full of fluid & stuff. so all night i'm worrying about that & stuff & i called her & left a message around 7:30 & then called again at 9:00 or so. she answered & said that they were keeping him over night & waiting for blood work to come back & getting an x-ray of his chest & something else but i can't remember. so that's making me worry & all. then i get a text message from Pew. i told him i wasn't having a very good day & he said neither was he. so he brought me some hot chocolate & we talked for about 10 minutes then i had to get back in the store. i called him at 10 & we talked for about 7-8 minutes. it was just nice getting to talk to him. when we're alone he'll open up more than if we're out with our friends. but i hope we'll get more time to talk & stuff in the near future. i was gonna get on-line last night & IM him & talk more but i got a shower & then did some homework & started my test. i did feel a little guilty not getting on but i really didn't have the chance. so i text him & let him know i was sorry & i told him i'd e-mail him this morning. (which i still need to do) well i'm gonna finish up on here & head to work a little early so i can stop & get some french vanilla cappuccino. i'm addicted to coffee again & hot chocolate. (damn Missy & her bad habits, LOL) alright late ~Karen
http://arch-angel24.livejournal.com/11028.html

i haven't bawled yet today. i got up about 9am & i've been doing some dishes & on the internet & playing DiabloII. oh & i'm watching the Sponge Bob Square Pants Movie. watching something stupid is kinda making me feel better. Luka is watching the cars outside through the window. i'm having Missy get me an enrollment application & financial aid paperwork for Penn Tech. i'm gonna talk to Karen about it today when i go in today. i don't really wanna say i'm depressed i'm just still on an emotional roller coaster.

i want my freedom. & i know what tattoo i'm getting in a few months after all this settles down & i'm kinda back into a routine. i'm going to get a butterfly on my upper arm & under it i want it to say "Fly Free". so it will always remind me to never compromise who i am for someone else & to always keep myself happy. i thought about that last night while i was laying wide awake in bed. my sister said that i would feel it in my heart if it was time to move on. & mom told me that no matter what i feel i've gotta stick by my decision. i've gotta grow some balls & stand up for myself. i can't let someone else run my life. i've gotta get control & live my life for me & only me.

like i know that i wanna travel. i don't wanna move away i just wanna travel. like Missy, Sarah & i all wanna go down to Florida to see our friend Josh who moved down there senior year. & i wanna go out to Wisconsin & visit my friend John (who wrote & published a book) & i also would like to return the courtisy that Sniper has shown to me by driving down to visit him since he's been up here to see me twice already. i want to spend more time with all of my family & i kinda feel like i'm being held back from them. i want to spend time with my niece & i want to spend time with my sister. i really want to spend time with my newest nieces (Autumn & Abigial). and i can't imagine not seeing my friends. i told myself after high school we wouldn't lose touch & we'd still spend time with each other. i've lost that factor & i want to get it back.

my sister told me that my body is my temple & that i should worship it with all that i am & do to it what i see fit. & honestly after she said that i was truly considering shaving my head again & piercing my chin & of course getting my tattoo.

well i feel a little better after getting some more of my thoughts out into the open. i've got some more things to get done around the house so i'll write more tonight if i have time, or tomorrow morning. ~late~
http://arch-angel24.livejournal.com/10817.html

i wish i could just stop thinking. my head hurts, i'm very emotional right now, i could bawl or kill someone at any moment. i've gotten a lot of good advice from both my sister & Mandy today but right now i just need to get all this emotion out of my system & i just don't know. fuck i feel just like leaving & going to Denny's or Perkins & just staying up all night drinking coffee & smoking cigs. i just don't wanna be in this environment right now. i want to be somewhere else.

Karen Braim --
[adjective]:

Extremely extreme!

'How will you be defined in the dictionary?' at QuizGalaxy.com

oh & i'm also doing quizes inbetween rantings. i'm talking to momma right now. she's helping me sort things through also. i really just need to bawl right now. ....... ok she made me bawl. but i feel a little better. oh well i'll get back to you tomorrow morning how i feel. ~late~
http://arch-angel24.livejournal.com/10664.html

haven't been on in a while. there's a lot of stuff going on right now. work is a bit hectic right now with having our Store Manager out in New Jersey right now. i'm having to put up with a lot of shit right now. it's just adding stress to all the other things i'm having to deal with. i don't really understand all the emotions i'm having right now. i just don't even know where to go from here. there's so much. i'll just start with the major issue. i don't think i want to be with Jason anymore. i've been thinking about this for a few weeks now. it's just that he's trying to control my life. he won't let me go out with my friends just because he isn't invited. mostly because they don't like each other. and i know that he doesn't like drinking because he had a bad experience with it. but ya know what that wasn't MY experience!! & it's not like i'm gonna get completely wasted everytime i go out!! i might have a few drinks but i can handle some amount of alcohol. then he doesn't like my Wicca books & stuff or anything about it. again he had a bad experience with it but i've tried to explain it to him numerous times that his Aunt was nuts with what they did (that was a cult not a coven) but he wants nothing to do with it. i just really don't know how to get through to him but he doesn't want me to even read the numerous books i have, let-alone practice. *sigh*
well i have to get ready for work but i'll comtinue this either tonight or tomorrow morning.
~late~
http://arch-angel24.livejournal.com/10312.html

well while i was at work today Jason set the computer back up... about time... we officially moved in last wednesday because that was the last day we had to go to the old apartment & get the rest of our stuff... his mom & grammy cleaned it for us... it's nice in the new apartment... i love it & Luka seems very happy as well...
i told momma about Luka... she already knew... she laid a pretty thick guilt trip on me but that than that she was fine...
work is getting really bad right now... had a bad day & i'm fearing the outcome tomorrow when i get to work...
Halloween is Monday!!! YAY!!! for work i'm dressing as a soccer player & for trick or treating i'm gonna be a coven witch i think... i'll just wear what i did last year for a coven vampire & just lose the fangs... lol... Jason's coming too... i'm dying his hair blue this weekend & he's gonna be a punk or something...
well i might have to go in early for work tomorrow so i better get to bed soon... late...
http://arch-angel24.livejournal.com/9990.html

we've been packing for about a week now & we will hopefully be moving our furniture in tomorrow, if it isn't raining... we have until the 23rd to get all of our stuff out & clean out the apartment... it really seems like we have a LOT of stuff left to go through & pack but i'm very much lacking the ambition to do any of it... plus with Luka running back & forth all the time it gets annoying...

i can't wait until she get de-clawed!! it's like $82 but it'll be worth it... it will save my arms & chest... she keeps getting worse with her scratching & biting... the biting is the worst but she hangs on with her claws so it really sucks... pretty soon everyone at work will think that i'm a cutter, it's that bad... right now she's acting all sweet & licking my hand as i'm typing... what a suck up... but i guess i still love her... i think she'll also settle down once we get her fixed, which isn't until December but who knows... she's watching the screen as i'm typing, she must know it's about her...

i got to watch Autumn & Abby last night for about an hour & a half... it was cool... Autumn was quiet & so was Abby until about 10 minutes before her Mommy came home... we watched The Incredibles... then when Mandy came home (around 9:30PM) we talked until Adam came home & i never got home until 12:20AM.. but i had a lot of fun talking to Mandy & stuff... i learned a lot about her & the family...

well i suppose i should get back to packing & writing my friend a letter back... late...

ps... Luka is now laying on my lap with her head on my left arm... suck up...
http://arch-angel24.livejournal.com/9895.html

well i'll be moving into a new apartment with Jason in about 2 weeks... it's above our chiropractor's office... let's see... it's $100 more a month, which kinda sucks... it has a bigger living room & bedroom... it's still a 1 bedroom... we're allowed to have Luka (cat), it's closer to work & my family/friends... we won't be long distance from my family who i call all the time... and during the moving process i can get rid of all the junk i haven't seen in 3 years because obviously i don't need it... plus it will allow us to get organized with his business & my AVON...

WORK UPDATE

it still sucks... while i was on my week vacation we lost another person... we're down to 15 associates (including me)... but we just hired 3 new people... hopefully they'll last more that 2 weeks... Karen goes on vacation the week of the 16th YAY!!

i believe that is all for what's going on right now... if something else comes up i'll add it when i get a chance... late!!
http://arch-angel24.livejournal.com/9595.html

the night was going great... i had to work but it was ok... then... the floor cleaners didn't show up until 8:30 (over an hour late!!) so i wouldn't get out of there until 11pm... ok i can deal with that i guess... then i walked out of the cash office & there was a huge spider hanging right in the middle of the doorway... that fucking sucked... then i tried to call home & let Jason know i'd be late & the voice mail picked up so i figured i'd check it... 3 messages... 2 just friends i needed to call back... the 3rd was our land-lady... we've been having a little trouble with our drainage from our shower... i guess a pipe was leaking down stairs in the back of the Pizza Shop... well she called & said that it is still leaking everytime we get a shower... and they had a guy look at it & he says that it's because we don't shut the shower door & that we can either shut the door or move somewhere else... so basically she wants us gone... i was sooo pissed, i saved the message so Jason could hear it later & i slammed the phone down... 1st of all we keep the fucking door shut... it's always shut... we even had to fix it so it would shut properly!!! and 2nd it's not coming from the door it's coming for the wall that they supposedly re-caulked but fucked it up!!! AUGH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
http://arch-angel24.livejournal.com/9307.html

yesterday and i was going to post it today but after reading it over & over i decided that it would do more harm than good... the only good it serves now is me getting out my feelings & frustrations... but if i were to post it, it would turn very bad... it would hurt people & that wouldn't make me happy... that would upset me more than just having written it & thrown it away... so i'll forget that i wrote it & tear it up... it was good for the moment but that has since faded & i'm left once again confused and drained from thinking about it...

i don't think shaving my head has really truly hit me yet... i still look in the mirror & think, 'oh yeah, i did do it.' nothing more... everyone says i look like GI Jane... it makes me smile to think about it... people look at me funny but i don't care... some even have to do a 'double-take' to make sure they saw what they did... i don't let it get to me... i really like it though... i got 4 new bandanas today... blue tie-dye, orange tie-dye, solid black & hunter green... now i just gotta get them washed & worn in...

the computer seems to be working ok... it hasn't shut down or frozen on me yet... **crosses fingers** hope i didn't jinx it... well i suppose i will go write in my other journal & then either play with Luke (kitten) or play PS... perhaps both in the end... late...
http://arch-angel24.livejournal.com/9130.html

i've been having some very severe computer issues therefore i haven't been able to update or even e-mail normally from this computer... i finally found a window of opportunity to update so here goes really fast...

July 2nd we brought home a kitten... it is now about 10-11 weeks old... it's wonderful... female, gray with black tiger stripes running down it's back with a white belly & gray spots on it... her name is Luka (named after the water sprite in Secret of Mana for the SNES

July 30th was our Assistant Managers last day (Dave the newest one)... he left for NY to start a new life with his wife & kids... we are currently still looking for a replacement

August 3rd @ 0400 hrs i get a phone call saying that Mandy's water broke & that they are going to the hospital & i need to be at the store at 0700 hrs to open... i say no problem & go back to sleep until 0620... the baby was born at 1314, 6lbs 5oz, 20" her name is Abigail Sarah... she was born 2 weeks early but is a very good thing because the cord was wrapped around her neck... she is now 12 days old & is doing wonderful & the proud mother & father at relieved as well...

August 12th i got a car!!!! it's a 91 Buick Skylark, white (not crazy about white but it'll get painted eventually), it has 58,000 miles on it... drives very nice... i'm very happy with it... i have a loan out for 3yrs @ $104 a month... which is good for me & it'll establish me credit since i have NONE!!! Jason still hasn't said too much about it... but we were up to park the Nissan at his grams & she was saying about giving more that getting in a relationship & how this wouldn't screw up us getting a house & how everything works out & stuff like that... she's a really nice lady, and not just because she's kinda on my side but because she's old & she's looking out for the younger generation & that sort of thing & she knows a lot about life and different situations...

August 14th i finally shaved my head... all of my hair is gone... i have about 1/8th of an inch if that... and i love it!! but i do not think it has fully hit me yet... we only have 3 mirrors in the apartment... 1 in the kitchen & 2 in the bathroom & every time i go to look i still kinda hesitate & then i'm like oh it's me that's right... i didn't cry yet or anything...

well that's about it for updates... i'm going into work in a couple of hours so i will go feed all my critters & play some PS before i have to leave... late...
http://arch-angel24.livejournal.com/8937.html

You Are Subversion!
You are systematic and secretive. Sometimes even very calculating. Most everyone trusts you but they have no idea what really goes on in your head. You are capable of being nice or mean, whatever a situation calls for. You look out for #1.

What Naughty My Little Pony Are You?

just a quick little blurb to let you know i'm still here... a lot has been going on lately... too much i think... although i try not to... anywayz, work is the same, people don't come to work & we've fired 2 so far this week... hired 3 new people & looking for more to replace others... well i have to unload truck today... yay... bad days started & i hurt all over... being female is sometimes way over-rated.......except for the lesbian sexual encounters... **smiles to self** well later...
http://arch-angel24.livejournal.com/8611.html

it is becoming a very hot & humid summer here in PA... and i decided that i was going to partially shave my head... now anyone that knows me, knows that i normally love my hair & keep it long & hate even getting it trimmed... well i pulled my hair from just atop my ears up & had my boyfriend SHAVE what was left hanging down... he buzzed it w/ the clippers & then shaved it down w/ a razor!!! and i LOVE IT!!!!! i was going to go all the way but i decided that i would try this out first & then if i didn't like it i would do the rest but so far i LOVE IT!!! he just did it about 3 hours ago... it's weird though, everytime i move w/ my hair down it feels like something is crawling up my neck!!! but it is sooo cool & the best part is, my mom & my boyfriend don't care!!! i'm gonna have my boyfriend or my mom dye it red on wednesday!!! i'm sooo happy!!!! it's something that i've always wanted to do and now i have!!!
well that's it... later!!!
http://arch-angel24.livejournal.com/8369.html

What did YOU do?

been feeling really pissed off lately... and depressed... and like i just want to break down and cry forever until i die... yeah i'm really in a dark place right now wondering if i'll find my way out...

woke up about 1/2hr ago... my back is killing me... i had another weird dream, but it's WAY too fucked up to even try to explain in text or audio... i work 2-10pm which kinda sucks & kinda doesn't, because truck is at 12:30 & i'll have a full crew until 8:30pm but still i'll have to put up w/ a bit of whining & stuff...

well that's enough fun for now!! i'm gonna go back to looking up tattoos & stuff... i've found a lot of really sweet butterflies & such... i really think that's what i'm going to get, probably either on my hip or on my right shoulder blade... i'm kinda aiming for my shoulder blade because i will be able to have it exposed until it heals so there will be less of a chance of color rubbing off... when i got my first tattoo there was a little bit of rubbing off of color, which i still need to get touched up... i got it 3 yrs ago as a graduation present...
well late...

i got like no sleep last night... i kept thinking about the stupid safe at work... it was short $10 when i left last night... i was sooo pissed... i called this morning & they didn't find it yet... i'm gonna go in around 11 & see if i can find anything... it really sucks... **growls then sighs** well now that i'm up this early i better get my nails & stuff painted... haven't done it in a while... i already trimmed & filed them, now they're ready for paint...
my 2 plecos were on the glass this morning when i got up... i haven't seen Buddy(this little one) in a few days & Plecosaur is as big as Ivan(my his soul be at peace) was!! they're good fish... LMAO, 2 of the sharks just ran head first into each other!! they are definitely entertaining... well i better do something... late...
http://arch-angel24.livejournal.com/7612.html

the past few days i've been having bad dreams about people that i went to school with... mostly about the people that i didn't like or were mean & snobby to others... this morning (about the last 3 hours) i had a really nasty one... the last thing that was happening was.........
i was in this house w/ Sarah & a couple other people i didn't know/recognize & her ex was coming through the front door w/ a type of crossbow... i stepped in the doorway so he couldn't get through & he pointed it straight at me & i said "go head and do it"... he just shook his head & lowered it... so i went in between the wall & the door as kind of a shield... & when i did he hit me in the gut with the butt of the cross bow... i didn't double over but it did hurt... then Sarah hugged him & told him to stop... i was really confused so i just kinda smiled & patted her on the ass with a small plastic pipe... then this asshole that we graduated with was sitting on a chair watching this & he told me to stop it or he'd shove something up my ass... i spun around, got right in his face & told him if he even tried to do anything to me he would regret it deeply... that's when a golden retriever came up to the door & wanted outside... so i let it out with a shrug... then that guy said something to my ex that was sitting beside him & they both laughed & i just gave them both a death stare...
needless to say when my alarm went off i was more than ready to kick some ass... i'm just glad Jason wasn't here to wake me up or he would've gotten hurt... i was sooo pissed off when i woke up... i think i hit snooze like 3 times just to see if i did kick that guys ass... but i never went back to dream world... nothing that i can think of could be triggering these dreams... i haven't seen any of these people except Sarah's ex since graduation... and i just don't feel that seeing Sarah's ex would trigger something that he had such a small part in... the beginning of the dream was really weird too... in a nutshell i was over at my other mom's house (i have like 10 mom's **smiles**) and i had to tow like 4 cars, that were exactly the same car, over to my momma's house... and i was in a truck with a guy that i've never seen before... but he was really nice... he really helped me out with the vehicles... bah... stupid dreams... i want my normal dreams back... the ones with vampires and zombies...
well i just had to get that outta my head... Adam & Mandy went to the dr yesterday to see what sex the baby is... i didn't get a phone call last night, but i work with Adam today so i'll ask him as soon as i see him... i've also been depressed lately... not sure why... just wanted to add that before i go get some work done... late...

this summer i have decided that i am getting my right cartilage pierced at a piercing shop, probably 16g and i am also going to get my left cart. stretched to match it... then i'm gonna get my first lobe holes stretched to probably 18g... this all was just decided w/i the past 15 minutes... i am also going to get another tattoo... last night Jason was looking at me & i said "what?" & he said "nothing i'm just looking at your ears." he said something like i took out my r. cart. but then he was like no you don't have it done... (actually i did have it done 2 summers ago but it got infected so i took it out & let it grow shut again) that's when i told him that i was getting it done again this summer at a piercing shop & about stretching my other cart... i haven't told him about stretching my lobes yet because i just decided that... he doesn't know about the tattoo either... he's not too keen on them but he's not gonna stop me... he may suggest a smaller size but he said he won't STOP me... which is really great because a while ago when i got my first tattoo (3yrs ago as a graduation gift) he really didn't like it... after it healed over he would scratch at it trying to get it off (which it didn't do any damage because it was already healed completely over)... but it really bothered me that he didn't like it... now he's better about it... he hasn't mentioned anything about it in like a yr... now i'm sure that he's gonna be a little difficult about it when i tell him that i'm getting another one but oh well... i'm not sure what yet... i'll have to look when i go up to get my piercing... i'm gonna try to save up the $$ so i don't have to pull out of my savings...
